Jun Han

Introduction

Jun Han is a South Korean singer and musician under JYP Entertainment. He made his official debut as the electric guitarist of the band Xdinary Heroes on December 6, 2021

On April 25, 2023, JYP Entertainment announced that Jun Han will be going on hiatus due to enteritis. He has since returned to activities.
